title: There are lots of jellyfish washed up on Wrightsville Beach and Figure 8.  I have walked the beach my whole life and never seen this type.  They are flatter and larger than the usual cabbage heads and have an unusual reddish/pink design on the underside.  Would love to know more about them.  Thanks.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=20394
